CLAUSE-UKR-SULINA.name: Sulina/Bystroe Channel
CLAUSE-UKR-SULINA.text:
SULINA AND BYSTROE PASSING CHARGES FOR OWNRS ACCOUNT.
VSSL TO USE BYSTROE CHANNEL AS PRIORITY, IN CASE NOT AVAILABLE THEN SULINA CHANNEL.

CLAUSE-UKR-AIRRAID.name: Air Raid Alerts
CLAUSE-UKR-AIRRAID.text: TIME LOST DUE TO WAR/AIR RAID ALERTS NOT TO COUNT AS L/T

CLAUSE-UKR-DETENTION.name: Detention Combined
CLAUSE-UKR-DETENTION.text: DEMURRAGE/DETENTION TO BE PAID TOGETHER WITH FREIGHT UPON COMPLETION OF DISCHARGE

CLAUSE-UKR-JCC.name: JCC Inspection
CLAUSE-UKR-JCC.text:
VSSL TO PASS INSPECTION BY JCC (JOINT COORDINATION CENTER) IN ISTANBUL PRIOR TO LOADING IN UKRAINE.
TIME WAITING FOR JCC INSPECTION NOT TO COUNT AS L/T.

CLAUSE-UKR-ERWI.name: War Insurance
CLAUSE-UKR-ERWI.text: ERWI - EXTENDED RUSSIA/UKRAINE WAR INSURANCE FOR OWNRS ACCOUNT

CLAUSE-UKR-CANCELLATION.name: War Cancellation
CLAUSE-UKR-CANCELLATION.text: IN CASE OF PORT CLOSURE DUE TO WAR ACTIVITIES, CHARTERERS HAVE THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE FIXTURE WITHOUT ANY CLAIMS FROM EITHER SIDE.

CLAUSE-EGY-NOR.name: Egypt NOR Hours
CLAUSE-EGY-NOR.text: AT DISCHARGE PORT N.O.R. TO BE TENDERED ON WORKING DAYS DURING OFFICE HRS (08:00-12:00 HRS) FROM SUNDAY TO THURSDAY

CLAUSE-EGY-SAMPLING.name: Egypt Sampling
CLAUSE-EGY-SAMPLING.text: AT DISCHARGE PORT SAMPLING CARRIED OUT AS PER EGYPTIAN LAWS AND REGULATIONS. TIME FOR SAMPLING NOT TO COUNT AS L/T.

CLAUSE-EGY-SHINC.name: SHINC/FHINC
CLAUSE-EGY-SHINC.text:
SATURDAYS, SUNDAYS AND HOLIDAYS INCLUDED (SHINC) AT LOAD PORT.
FRIDAYS, SATURDAYS AND HOLIDAYS INCLUDED (FHINC) AT DISCHARGE PORT.
